message: Hello buyer, this is a high-quality product and I highly recommend it. I'm a new seller, so I don't have any previous sales record, but I assure you that this product is worth the $100 price tag. Don't miss out on this great opportunity!

I'm not going to take the word of a new seller without any sales record. Can I see the product first and then decide based on its quality? I'm willing to take the risk of it being low quality, but I'd like to make an informed decision.

Hello buyer, I understand that trust needs to be built. Unfortunately, the product can't be shown before purchase, but I can tell you that I've had one previous product that didn't sell, and I'm eager to start building a positive sales record. I assure you that this product is of high quality, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with your purchase if you decide to buy it for $100.
